mutants.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def prepare_nn_input(df, lookback, lookforward, features):
    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)
    n = len(df)
    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + 1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df['time'].shift(1)).fillna(1)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback + lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i + lookback + lookforward]
    return (X_res, y_res)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def prepare_nn_input(df, lookback, lookforward, features):
    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)
    n = len(df)
    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + 1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df['time'].shift(1)).fillna(0)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback - lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i + lookback + lookforward]
    return (X_res, y_res)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def prepare_nn_input(df, lookback, lookforward, features):
    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)
    n = len(df)
    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + -1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df['time'].shift(1)).fillna(0)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback + lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i + lookback + lookforward]
    return (X_res, y_res)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def prepare_nn_input(df, lookback, lookforward, features):
    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)
    n = len(df)
    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + 1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback - lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df['time'].shift(1)).fillna(0)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback + lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i + lookback + lookforward]
    return (X_res, y_res)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

def prepare_nn_input(df, lookback, lookforward, features):
    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)
    n = len(df)
    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + 1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df['time'].shift(1)).fillna(0)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback + lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i * lookback + lookforward]
    return (X_res, y_res)

import numpy as np

    df.sort_values(by='time', inplace=True)

    X_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), lookback + lookforward + 1, len(features)))
    y_res = np.zeros((n - (lookback + lookforward), 1))
    time_diff = (df['time'] - df[''].shift(1)).fillna(0)
    time_diff = time_diff.cumsum()
    for i in range(n - (lookback + lookforward)):
        X_res[i] = df[features].values[i:i + lookback + lookforward + 1]
        y_res[i] = df[features[0]].values[i + lookback + lookforward]
